sentences.en: a bacon, lettuce and tomato sandwich
sentences.cn: 咸肉、生菜加番茄三明治

sentences.en: a bacon, lettuce and tomato sandwich
sentences.cn: 熏肉生菜番茄三明治

sentences.en: And also Mapo beancurd, fish flavored pork and lettuce with oyster sauce.
sentences.cn: 还有麻婆豆腐, 鱼香肉丝和蚝油生菜.

sentences.en: Do you like lettuce in sandwiches?
sentences.cn: 你喜欢在三明治里放生菜吗？

sentences.en: Do you like lettuce in sandwiches?
sentences.cn: 你喜欢吃莴苣三明治吗?。

sentences.en: Get some lettuce and tomatoes so I can make a salad.
sentences.cn: 买些莴苣和西红柿,我好做色拉.

sentences.en: I want it with lettuce instead of peas.
sentences.cn: 我要配生菜,不要豌豆.

sentences.en: If lettuce is served with the salad, one may eat it or not, as one prefers.
sentences.cn: 如果色拉下面垫着莴苣, 莴苣可以随意吃,或不吃.

sentences.en: If you've suffered anxiety, headaches, or muscle or joint pain, you might already be familiar with wild lettuce.
sentences.cn: 如果你曾经遭受过焦虑、头痛、肌肉或关节疼痛的症状，你也许已经熟悉了野莴苣。

sentences.en: Kate washed the lettuce and drained it.
sentences.cn: 凯特把生菜洗干净并且把水滴干.

sentences.en: Lettuce was grown by the Ancient Romans.
sentences.cn: 古罗马人最先种植莴苣。

sentences.en: One of the most popular kinds is the BLT - bacon, lettuce and tomato.
sentences.cn: 最常用的一种 BLT,即火腿 、 生菜和番茄.

sentences.en: One potential test of public acceptance could come with the marketing of irradiated spinach and lettuce.
sentences.cn: 一个民众接受程度的可能性测试将与辐照菠菜和莴苣的上市销售同步进行。

sentences.en: Serve the fish on a bed of shredded lettuce.
sentences.cn: 先铺一层碎生菜叶，再把鱼放上，就可以上桌了。

sentences.en: She cut the lettuce in half and took away the heart.
sentences.cn: 她将莴苣切成两半,然后取走了菜心.

sentences.en: So why does it feel like even the lettuce is out to get us?
sentences.cn: 那么为什么感觉甚至连莴苣都要加害我们呢？

sentences.en: The lettuce is crisp and cold.
sentences.cn: 莴苣松脆爽口.

sentences.en: Wash and dry the lettuce.
sentences.cn: 将莴苣洗洗再晾干。

sentences.en: Wash lettuce and cut into thin shreds. Place at bottom of glass.
sentences.cn: 生菜洗净切丝,放进玻璃杯底,再加入无尾虾、果和红甜椒.

sentences.en: Wash the lettuce and pat it dry.
sentences.cn: 把莴苣洗一下拍干。

sentences.en: We have fresh cabbage, celery, lettuce and spinach.
sentences.cn: 有新鲜的卷心菜、芹菜、生菜和菠菜。

trans.tran_en: a round vegetable with thin green leaves eaten raw in salads
